resources: True or False\ 1/10 This is a species of monkey native to Europe 2/10 Female lions do 90% of the hunting // True 3/10 An ostrich\'s eye is larger than its brain // True 4/10 The alligator has the strongest bite of any animal // False 5/10 A flea can jump up to 300x its body length // False 6/10 At birth, kangaroos are only an inch long // True 7/10 Just under half of all pigs in the world can be found in China // False 8/10 A woodpecker can peck 20 times per second // True 9/10 Koala\'s fingerprints look nearly identical to those of humans // True 10/10 Sheep can recognize human faces // True \\/ Next \\/ False True Welcome to True or False, a game where you guess which animal facts are lies!
